data.title: TLE Releases New Single, "Drive Thru Records Was The Best Record Label In The History Of Anything, Ever" — Revival Recordings
data.meta_description: Our favorite Dadpunk trio are back with their second single of their Revival 52 takeover. data.text: Our favorite Dadpunk trio are back with their second single of their Revival 52 takeover. The track, titled "Drive Thru Records Was The Best Record Label In The History Of Anything, Ever," is all about these dads’ favorite record label and the music that shaped them. The new single can be purchased on iTunes or streamed on all digital platforms now! Trust us, you won’t regret it!
